collect_active_jobs.title: CollectActiveJobs toggles collection of detailed per-job metrics.

collect_disk_metrics.title: CollectDiskMetrics toggles collection of disk unit statistics.

collect_disks_matching.title: DiskSelector filters disk units by name using glob-style patterns.

collect_http_server_metrics.title: CollectHTTPServerMetrics toggles collection of IBM HTTP Server statistics.

collect_job_queue_metrics.title: CollectJobQueueMetrics toggles collection of job queue backlog metrics.

collect_job_queues_matching.title: JobQueueSelector filters job queues by name using glob-style patterns.

collect_plan_cache_metrics.title: CollectPlanCacheMetrics toggles collection of plan cache analysis metrics.

collect_subsystem_metrics.title: CollectSubsystemMetrics toggles collection of subsystem activity metrics.

collect_subsystems_matching.title: SubsystemSelector filters subsystems by name using glob-style patterns.

connection_type.title: ConnectionType selects how the collector connects (currently only "odbc").

database.title: Database selects the IBM i database (library) to use when building the DSN.

dsn.title: DSN provides a full IBM i ODBC connection string if manual override is needed.

hostname.title: Hostname is the remote IBM i host to monitor.

max_active_jobs.title: MaxActiveJobs caps how many active jobs may be charted.

max_db_conns.title: MaxDbConns restricts the maximum number of open ODBC connections.

max_db_life_time.title: MaxDbLifeTime limits how long a pooled connection may live before being recycled.

max_disks.title: MaxDisks caps how many disk units may be charted.

max_job_queues.title: MaxJobQueues caps how many job queues may be charted.

max_subsystems.title: MaxSubsystems caps how many subsystems may be charted.

odbc_driver.title: ODBCDriver specifies the driver name registered on the host.

password.title: Password supplies the password used for authentication.

port.title: Port is the TCP port for the IBM i Access ODBC server.

reset_statistics.title: ResetStatistics toggles destructive SQL services that reset system statistics on each query.

timeout.title: Timeout controls how long to wait for SQL statements and RPCs.

use_ssl.title: UseSSL enables TLS for the ODBC connection when supported by the driver.

username.title: Username supplies the credentials used for authentication.

vnode.title: Vnode allows binding the collector to a virtual node.
